com.namics.oss.spring.support.i18n.dao

Class SimpleJdbcMessageSourceDao

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.springframework.dao.support.DaoSupport
      • org.springframework.jdbc.core.support.JdbcDaoSupport
        • com.namics.oss.spring.support.i18n.dao.SimpleJdbcMessageSourceDao
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    MessageSourceDao, MessageSourceManagementDao, org.springframework.beans.factory.InitializingBean

    public class SimpleJdbcMessageSourceDao
extends org.springframework.jdbc.core.support.JdbcDaoSupport
implements MessageSourceManagementDao
    SimpleJdbcMessageSourceDao provides a basic spring based implementation for using SQL Database with JDBC. You can configure SQL queries including parameter replacement. Watch concrete property descriptions for details.
    Since:
    Namics commons i18n 1.0 - Oct 18, 2010
    Author:
    aschaefer, namics ag
